modmenu.descriptionTranslation.goop: Adds Splatter Particle Effects for Blood, Slime or other cool VFX
text.autoconfig.goop.title: Goop Config
text.autoconfig.goop.option.fancyGoop.@T: Disable for better performance, enable for better goop!
Whether Goop should wrap to block edges.
text.autoconfig.goop.option.randomRot.@T: Whether Goop should be rotated randomly.
text.autoconfig.goop.option.censorMature: Replaces the colors of Goop VFX marked as mature with the censor Color.
text.autoconfig.goop.option.censorMode.@: How to censor Mature content, if it is enabled.
text.autoconfig.goop.option.permanent.@T: Prevents goop from fading. If enabled, goop will only disappear by being unloaded or the Goop Cap being reached.
text.autoconfig.goop.option.goopCap.@Too: Limits the amount of Goop Puddles that can exist at a time.
text.autoconfig.goop.option.rainCleaning: Washes away Goop Puddles directly under the sky when it rains.
text.autoconfig.goop.option.goopDebug.@T: [WARNING] VERY LAGGY | Adds extra particles to show vertex info of goop puddles
text.autoconfig.goop.option.showDev.@Too: Whether emitters marked as developer content should be visible. (All example emitters are marked as dev content for instance)
